trans-unit.resname: %1%1. Demo 17 is a speical demo which was created by the Visual composer module. You have to install the Visual composer module before importing data. You also need to carefully read the "One-click demo importer" section on the online documention before importing the demo.%2%
trans-unit.source: %1%1. Demo 17 is a speical demo which was created by the Visual composer module. You have to install the Visual composer module before importing data. You also need to carefully read the "One-click demo importer" section on the online documention before importing the demo.%2%
trans-unit.target: %1%1. Demo 17 is a speical demo which was created by the Visual composer module. You have to install the Visual composer module before importing data. You also need to carefully read the "One-click demo importer" section on the online documention before importing the demo.%2%

trans-unit.resname: 2. IMPORTANT Upload folders in the "One click demo import" folder into the root folder of your Prestashop installation before importing.
trans-unit.source: 2. IMPORTANT Upload folders in the "One click demo import" folder into the root folder of your Prestashop installation before importing.
trans-unit.target: 2. IMPORTANT Upload folders in the "One click demo import" folder into the root folder of your Prestashop installation before importing.

trans-unit.resname: 3. Click "Demo x" buttons to import predefined demos. You have two choises, one is importing all data, another is improting colors only.
trans-unit.source: 3. Click "Demo x" buttons to import predefined demos. You have two choises, one is importing all data, another is improting colors only.
trans-unit.target: 3. Click "Demo x" buttons to import predefined demos. You have two choises, one is importing all data, another is improting colors only.

trans-unit.resname: 4. "Featured categories slider" module and "Product slider for each category" module can not be expored/imported, because of categories are differnt from sites to sites.
trans-unit.source: 4. "Featured categories slider" module and "Product slider for each category" module can not be expored/imported, because of categories are differnt from sites to sites.
trans-unit.target: 4. "Featured categories slider" module and "Product slider for each category" module can not be expored/imported, because of categories are differnt from sites to sites.

trans-unit.resname: 5. Sample accounts will be appied to these modules "Facebook page plugin", "Twitter Embedded Timelines" and "Instagram block", so you are going to use your account instead after importing.
trans-unit.source: 5. Sample accounts will be appied to these modules "Facebook page plugin", "Twitter Embedded Timelines" and "Instagram block", so you are going to use your account instead after importing.
trans-unit.target: 5. Sample accounts will be appied to these modules "Facebook page plugin", "Twitter Embedded Timelines" and "Instagram block", so you are going to use your account instead after importing.

trans-unit.target: The default image type of the main product image is "medium_default" 420px in wide. When the image column width is larger that 4, "large_default" image type will be applied, it is 700px in wide. You may need to change the size of those image types to make images look sharpe.
